text: Raymond Albert Kroc (October 5, 1902 - January 14, 1984) was an American entrepreneur. He was best known for turning the McDonald's restaurant chain into a franchise company. Kroc's life while franchising McDonald's was made into a movie called The Founder with Michael Keaton playing Kroc. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1984 deaths Category:Businesspeople from Illinois Category:American chief executives Category:McDonald's Category:People from Oak Park, Illinois
title: Ray Kroc
